descriptionHtml:
Hi there, just started fiddling around with the Creation Kit. This .esp adds an extra playable race called the Ghost Elves to your game. The .esp uses vanilla assets, specifically Dark Elf assets.

[b]Installation
[/b]1. Extract the ghostelfrace.esp to your .../Skyrim/Data folder.
2. Open the Skyrim launcher
3. Click Data Files and select ghostelfrace.esp
To uninstall, just delete ghostelfrace.esp

[b]Features
[/b]-Four skin tones: Human dark, Human corpse, orange, and dark gray
-lots and lots of eye shapes to choose from, even some Human ones (I think)
-Starting bonuses: Conjuration 20, Light Armor 5, Lockpicking 5, Sneak 5
-Start with the Raise Zombie spell.
-A power called "RebukeUndead" which is Reanimate Corpse but for 50ish Magicka

[b]Flaws
[/b]-can't change eye color
-can't change hair style
-there's an odd bug that makes the Ghost Elf use the same preset as the Dark Elf the first time you click on any version. Click on a different race then select Ghost Elf again to see the "real" version

[b]Other
[/b]I apologize in advance for the limited cosmetic options and the unbalanced nature of the race. Have fun.
author: Buzzclaw
